title: Ahlai
html: AHLAI(Ahʹlai).1. Likely the daughter of Sheshan of the tribe of Judah, given in marriage to her father’s Egyptian servant Jarha for whom she bore Attai. However, Ahlai, if actually a son of Sheshan, may have died early.—1Ch 2:31, 34, 35.2. Father of Zabad, who was a mighty man in David’s army.—1Ch 11:41.
